thread.title: SHABBAT SHALOM DECEMBER 29TH

author: Shanus Honored Contributor Posts
title: SHABBAT SHALOM DECEMBER 29TH
text:

12-29-2023 08:02 AM
Shabbat Shalom and a Happy & Healthy New Year to everyone.
Welcome to this inclusive thread on Fridays. All religions, ethnicities and ages are invited to share their thoughts.
It's been a tumultuos year for sure. We will all come through it and on the other side.
Have a wonderful and safe weekend. Stay warm or cool depending where you live. Remember to always be kind to someone who needs a helpful hand. It could be you at some time.
Shanus
12-29-2023 08:20 AM
12-29-2023 08:27 AM
12-29-2023 08:43 AM
12-29-2023 08:46 AM
Wishing everyone Peace and Happiness in the coming year. God Bless!!
12-29-2023 09:01 AM
Happy New Year dear friends! I hope you all have a safe and wonderful weekend as we ring in the new year!
12-29-2023 09:35 AM
HAPPY 2024!!! Wishing everyone Health, Happiness, Prosperity & ALL the LOVE in the world!!!
12-29-2023 10:34 AM
Good Shabbos, may the new year bring us all peace, happiness and good health.
I was looking at my new 2024 calendar, all the Jewish holidays are late this year, first night of Hanukkah is on Christmas Day.
12-29-2023 12:16 PM
Good Shabbos and Happy 2024. I often wonder what happened to Sunala the originator of this thread.
12-29-2023 12:25 PM
Good shabbos and Happy New Year!
